Subject: Statement of Accounts for_ BAHRAIN-4028609208-STYLE AVENUE BAHRAIN W.L.L Style Avenue Bahrain W.L.L -
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


   

Greetings of the day!

														
																
Please find attached the statement of account as at 31st of December 2024

										
													`

		
We look forward to a payment confirmation by the 25th of January 2024 in the name of Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf) B.S.C ©.

						
																
In case you have already settled part/full premiums mentioned in the SOA. Please provide us with payment details for reconciliation.

						
To avoid any claims and renewals blockage kindly provide us with the allocation details as per this SOA along with the payments.

chunks.text:
In case you have already settled part/full premiums mentioned in the SOA. Please provide us with payment details for reconciliation.

						
To avoid any claims and renewals blockage kindly provide us with the allocation details as per this SOA along with the payments.

						
																
For queries/disputes/document request, kindly revert on Regional.creditcontrol@gig-gulf.com within a week for us to take appropriate action. 

				
																
Note: We do not accept cash payments, request you to arrange for bank transfer or cheque payment in the name of Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf) B.S.C ©.

				
																
Note - Due to Year end finalization, we have closed our books on 20th December 2024, hence payments credited on or after 21st December 2024 will be considered in January 2025 statement, however Installment on the policies issued in the past matured during the period from 21st to 30th December 2024 will be appearing on Statement of Accounts.

	
		
																	
On request an updated statement will be sent post allocation of payments (if any). 

									
																	
Important Notice:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

		
 

													 

		
Over 60 days O/S has to be settled within 10 days from the date of this email.

								 

		
 

													 

		
No Credit for XI policies: If any XI (medical individual) policy premiums are O/S in the attached statement. Kindly include all such premiums in the next settlement to avoid disruption of service.

chunks.text:
Over 60 days O/S has to be settled within 10 days from the date of this email.

								 

		
 

													 

		
No Credit for XI policies: If any XI (medical individual) policy premiums are O/S in the attached statement. Kindly include all such premiums in the next settlement to avoid disruption of service.

 

		
 

													 

		
30 days credit for medical policies other than XI: Please pay all other medical premiums due as per attached SoA. Non-payment of premium within the credit period may automatically 

 

		
stop preapprovals and claim settlements.

										 

		
 

													 

		
Overdue Amount: Any amount shown in the overdue category of the attached statements are to be included in the next payment.

				 

		
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

		
																	
Thank you,

																
Gulf Insurance Group (Gulf) B.S.C ©

														
Credit Control - Finance Department

														
Regional.creditcontrol@gig-gulf.com <mailto:Regional.creditcontrol@gig-gulf.com> 

														
																	
AXA is now GIG

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

		
Important Notice: AXA Insurance (Gulf) B.S.C. © has been acquired by Gulf Insurance Group (GIG). We are in the process of making changes to our branding and will be operating under a new entity name.

 

		
This change does not impact any transactions you make with us and we will continue to serve our customers with the same standards, integrity and leadership. We remain a regulated company and continue to provide

Before opening any attachments, please check them for viruses and defects. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________ إشعار بالسرية: يعتبر هذا البريد الإلكتروني (وبالإضافة لأي مرفقات) سرّي ومخصّص فقط لاستخدام المُرسَل إليه (المُرسَل إليهم). قد يحتوي على معلومات لحقوق أو امتيازات قانونية أو مهنية أو أخرى. إذا لم تكن المُرسَل إليه المقصود، يرجى إبلاغ المُرسِل على الفور وإتلاف هذا البريد الإلكتروني. أي وجهات نظر أو آراء يتم التعبير عنها أو ذكرها في هذه الرسالة هي آراء المرسل الشخصيّة، باستثناء الحالات التي يوضّحها المرسل بشكل صريح وبالسُلطة المخوّلة إليه بأنها وجهات نظر مجموعة الخليج للتأمين (الخليج) ش.م.ب. (م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب.
